channel.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
channel.description:
Hi, first runthrough, and I've ran into four minor glitches.
[img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/558701251495729300/7196A998C2AE2467E9467194099EFFA5DDCF0E83/[/img] 1) Sector C Locker Room, Post-cascade. The roof of the other (not Freeman's) locker has no texture.
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/558701251495731846/11035A404CEE3FE0BFB7C567EFD8E842C84427F0/[/img] 2) Unforeseen consequences. After you traverse the pipes where the Houndeye has destroyed the bridge. After the load, if you backtrack to that destroyed catwalk, and look at the grate, it will magically be there again.
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/558701251495730055/1822B40AEC47AE22F1D8DE64FA6A9BFE5342356F/[/img] 3) We've Got Hostiles: Room with two bridges and alot of Barnacles. If you fall down towards the fan, you simply get reloaded, no fade or anything. Not really a glitch, but it seems a bit abrupt.
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/558701251495728226/4D7CE067DF9C968D942A5FA87B4F5B6983FE3F43/[/img] 4) On A Rail: After raising the rocket, if you board the tram and go forward far enough for the door back to the rocket silo to close, and then back up, the tram will go through the door partway.
NOTE: I read the instructions after I took these screenshots. I'll go back and get the maps and locations once I finish my playthrough, but I just wanted to post these before I forgot.

item.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: ThePuddingMaster
item.description:
I’ll add what I found


in the water behind the dam, the bit nearest the side you enter the map from, you can see through the dam.


In the lambda reactor core bit, the walkway that moves up and down didn’t kill me, just got me stuck in the ceiling.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
1. Surface Tension, after violating the Hivehand: at the bottom of that lift is a truck backed into a loading platform. It is possible to get stuck in the triangle formed by the hindleft corner of the truck and the dock.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Oh, two more. Completely forgot about these:

7 ) Surface Tension: Cliffside, after you shoot down the chopper, it stays at the bottom of the world-box.

8 ) A tunnel door was missing brushes inside the doorframe, I forgot where it was, I’ll update it with a location when I see it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Well, final bug report:

Can’t get the Secret Hat up the Lambda core teleport puzzle. I can’t pick up the hat while on the centrifuge arms. I can shoot it, but I can’t pick it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
More minor things, mostly textures:

  1. Questionable Ethics “You are here” maps: Extremely minor, but the mark for the Conference Room B1 is missing on all instances of the map.

  2. Questionable Ethics: Random computer screen typo. It says “STANBY” when I think it’s supposed to say “STANDBY”, unless the D was cut out to save space on the screen.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug reports: Glitches [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
Hi, first runthrough, and I’ve ran into four minor glitches.

  1. Sector C Locker Room, Post-cascade. The roof of the other (not Freeman’s) locker has no texture.


2) Unforeseen consequences. After you traverse the pipes where the Houndeye has destroyed the bridge. After the load, if you backtrack to that destroyed catwalk, and look at the grate, it will magically be there again.


3) We’ve Got Hostiles: Room with two bridges and alot of Barnacles. If you fall down towards the fan, you simply get reloaded, no fade or anything. Not really a glitch, but it seems a bit abrupt.


4) On A Rail: After raising the rocket, if you board the tram and go forward far enough for the door back to the rocket silo to close, and then back up, the tram will go through the door partway.

NOTE: I read the instructions after I took these screenshots. I’ll go back and get the maps and locations once I finish my playthrough, but I just wanted to post these before I forgot.

Read full topic
